Interface IFormulasService

    Represents a service for working with formulas

      • setIterationsCount

        void setIterationsCount(int value)
        Sets the number of iterations for formulas calculation

      • setIterativeCalculations

        void setIterativeCalculations(boolean value)
        Switches the iterative calculations mode
        Parameters:
        value - the mode, true - enables, false - disables
